rules.text: No illegal (in Germany, where this server is located), harmful, offensive, or fraudulent content.
No content in support of National Socialism (aka. Nazis).
No copyrighted content or content that misappropriates the IP of others.
No child pornography or jail bait.
No accounts for the sole purpose of advertising, scraping, or spamming. This includes corporate accounts (exceptions may apply, you may ask over email before signing up).
No automated/bot accounts that post pornography (porn bots from other instances are not blocked, but they are not permitted to sign up locally).
